thread.section_title: Zodee Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zodee | zodee.com.au
thread.title: NARELLE SPEARS

author: NARELLE SPEARS
title: NARELLE SPEARS
text:
I have now done 3 orders with Zodee, ordered heaps and sent back what didn't fit freight free!!! What an amazing service to offer regional Australia. Thank you
Orders arrive swiftly, and returns are processed in a timely manner. Emails are answered immediately and queries clarified instantly. It would appear customer service is their highest priority and they are successful in delivering.
Well done Zodee. How refreshing to deal with you.
